desc: Retrieve information about a remote file added to Slack

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

channel.desc: Filter files appearing in a specific channel, indicated by its ID.

cursor.desc: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/apis/web-api/pagination) for more detail.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return.

ts_from.desc: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.desc: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

invalid_cursor.desc: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.

no_bot_user_for_app.desc: Cannot call the Remote Files endpoints unless app has associated bot user
